general.gigTitle: do wordpress business website development and website design

sellerCard.oneLiner: Empowering Businesses with Custom WordPress Solutions
sellerCard.description:
Hi, This is Rasib Chaudhary, a WordPress developer with 7 years of experience, I specialize in responsive mobile-friendly Websites including LMS, Membership and eLearning portals, E-commerce, and Business Websites.
I also write custom code to meet the requirements of my client.

As an entrepreneur, I do digital marketing for all my businesses myself. 
I can give you 1 Hour consultation to get an organic ranking in Google search via SEO. For Swift results,  I can create a flow chart for Paid ads (PPC).
 
Marketing consultation comes free of cost with a web development service.

description.content:
Hi. This is Rasib Chaudhary, A WordPress website developer.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do I need to get started?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Please get in touch with me before making a purchase. We can discuss and determine the most suitable plan for your needs. Additionally, please provide your domain and hosting login details. If you have already installed WordPress on your domain, I will also require the WordPress login credentials.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer services for purchasing domains and hosting?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I do not provide domain and hosting purchasing services. However, I can offer recommendations on which hosting plan suits your website size. It's strongly advised that you purchase your domain and hosting with your own identity and payment method to enhance security and protect against hackers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you offer services for content writing and provide access to stock photos?
Is support provided after the completion of the work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Certainly! I offer a complimentary 2-month period of technical support following the completion of the work. Even beyond this period, I can address your issues at minimal or no charges, depending on the nature of the task.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can I manage the website myself later?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Certainly! You can definitely manage it. I will provide you with a demo session on how to upload and edit content on your own, even without any technical expertise. It's quite straightforward.

reviews.comment: I had the pleasure of working with Rasib to create my WordPress website, and I couldn‚Äôt be happier with the results. The project required a clean, user-friendly interface with calendar and payment integration, and Rasib delivered flawlessly. As someone very particular about my vision, I truly appreciated how he went above and beyond to make it happen. He patiently answered all my questions about hosting, scheduling plugins, and payment gateways, even researching solutions to provide the best recommendations. Professional, innovative, and incredibly helpful, Rasib brought my long-awaited website to life. Highly recommend!

He told me it will be done in a few days and nothing was done.. its a waste of money, do not work with this guy, he waited until the order was automatically marked as completed and does not respond for revisions and completion after that. Thats probabably how he is getting good reviews, he does not respond anymore and no plan of completing the project.
